idea: Providing the ERP system to small shops and retailers. Billing and maintenance of all transactions in the major issue for any business no matter its size. Being small in capital its really difficult to setup a full fledged billing system without hurting the bank balance in the current scenario. Very costly hardware and huge annual fees of software keep the small retailers at bay, we at Frostfire Tronics, want to solve this issue and make such tools available for everyone
name: FROSTFIRE TRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Hoshner Adeena Research And Investment is a sub broker Pvt Ltd company with Sykes And Ray Equities (I) ltd. 


Our company is exclusively engaged in fundamental research of macro and micro economic data.


Our company model is based on providing the best research information that help our clients make informed investment decisions for wealth management and creation.
name: Hoshner Adeena Research And Investments Pvt.Ltd

idea:
Relu AI Systems was started to address one major concern in the security industry - facial recognition.  Our proprietary model Facebot - is an AI enabled enterprise grade face detection and recognition system.  Facebot does 4 things: Capture the faces,  store the meta data of all the  faces, match them and send alerts to one or many  to notify a visitor - whether unpleasant or widely welcomed.


Facebot's memory can span months and years, millions of faces and makes the faces shareable at a click of a button.


Relu AI System is working on many application areas where facial recognition can make a difference.
name: RELU AI SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
BETAGAMMA TECH PRIVATE LIMITED is a global independent distributor for electronic components with stocks readily available to dispatch with number, MOQ, SPQ. 

It supports more than 20 million of the electronic components sourcing needs with engineering data support, locating all your required components for your design and production needs. Thus, acquiring products at best prices for startups and multinationals and thereby contributing to economic growth.
name: BETAGAMMA TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
